title: Franchise Hockey Manager 1.0.0 Patch - SoN
description:
Game: Franchise Hockey Manager
Version: 1.0.0
Coded: September 8, 2013 by gone and RazorX of SoN
Type: Patch

Description: Franchise Hockey Manager ("FHM") is the deepest, most immersive, and most customizable hockey management game in the world. Choose one of 19 leagues and select a team to guide to glory. Sign free agents, trade players, draft the next crop of superstars, and much more!

Instructions: This is just a basic patch. Install FHM 1.0.0 as normal. Open the patch. Click the "Browse For Exe" button and select fhm2014.exe from the installation folder. Tick the "Make Backup" box if you want to make a backup of the original exe. Click the "Crack Game" button. Open the game and register with the serial key "FHM2014-MWWF-WVTK-PN95-LXQ7-H665". That is it. Enjoy!

Notes: "My software never has bugs. It just develops random features."
